n = int(input())
a = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
b = [int(x) for x in input().split()]

if a[0] > b[1]:
    a[0] -= b[1]
    b[1] = 0
else:
    b[1] -= a[0]
    a[0] = 0
if a[2] > b[0]:
    a[2] -= b[0]
    b[0] = 0
else:
    b[0] -= a[2]
    a[2] = 0
if a[1] > b[2]:
    a[1] -= b[2]
    b[2] = 0
else:
    b[2] -= a[1]
    a[1] = 0

print(min(a), max(a))

# print(min_win,max_win)

n = int(input())
a = list(map(int,input().split()))
b = list(map(int,input().split()))

ans = 0

for i in range(3):
    if a[i] == n or b[i] == n:
        continue
    else:
        if (i - i)%3 == 1:
            ans += min(a[i],b[i])
        elif (i - i)%3 == 2:
            ans += min(a[i],b[i])

print(ans,n-ans)
